item.title: Dønn Disippel – finally in English
item.description: My podcast “Dønn Disippel” is usually both off topic and not least wrong language to mention much on this blog (though there is a link on top next to the Norwegian flag). Until now, that is! This latest episode is in English, which means I can finally show (and not just tell) my international audience some of what I’m up to. Still off topic, sure, but now you at least know what it is.
